titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal courthouse located at 555 Independence Street, Cape Girardeau, Missouri, as the "Rush H. Limbaugh, Sr., Federal Courthouse".
An act to designate the United States courthouse located at 555 Independence Street, Cape Girardeau, Missouri, as the 'Rush H. Limbaugh, Sr. United States Courthouse'.".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe without amendment and an amendment to the title. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 626.

action.text: Star Print ordered on the bill.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/30/2006--Passed Senate amended. Designates the federal courthouse at 555 Independence Street, Cape Girardeau, Missouri, as the "Rush H. Limbaugh, Sr., Federal Courthouse."
